alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 8:13PM EDT until July 02 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Taylor County in west central Georgia... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 813 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Charing, or near Butler, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Reynolds, Charing, Fickling Mill and Potterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
